cast.name: 安德斯·巴斯莫·克里斯蒂安森 Anders Baasmo Christiansen
麦德斯·斯加德·彼得森 Mads Sjøgård Pettersen

awards:
第59届柏林国际电影节(2009)
　　费比西奖（国际影评人联盟奖） 全景单元最佳影片 鲁纳·登斯塔·朗格洛

director.name: 鲁纳·登斯塔·朗格洛 Rune Denstad Langlo

duration: Germany: 78 分钟(Berlin International Film Festival)
introduction: NORTH Following a nervous breakdown, ski athlete Jomar has isolated himself in a lonely existence as the guard of a ski park. When he learns that he might be the father of a child way up north, he sets on a strange and poetic journey through Norway on a snowmobile, with 5 liters of alcohol as sole provisions. On this trip through amazing arctic landscapes, Jomar seems to do everything in his power to avoid reaching his destination. He meets other tender and confused souls, who will all contribute to push Jomar further along his reluctant journey towards the brighter side of life.
